content: make it less about swaps and more about paying in crypto for the dog walking services

Working on adding a bright purple color theme and styling the form nicely.
use a colorful theme, use bright purple shades, and beautiful the styles of this form

The user requested adjustments to a project to make it resonate more with Uniswap's branding and functionality, specifically asking for color adjustments to pink and enhancing the detail to mirror that of Uniswap. The AI then asked for clarification on two fronts: if a specific shade of pink was preferred and whether the user was requesting specific UI elements or an overall design complexity emulating Uniswap. The user was also presented with a list of additional features, like implementing a dropdown form component and integrating various user interface elements including an interactive map for dog walking paths, a component for booking dog walks, and a notification system for walk reminders. The AI confirmed the implementation of these components. Moreover, the user showed interest in adding a yellow box for displaying alerts or additional information within the app, to which the AI also agreed. In addition to these features, the user sought to include a UI widget for Uniswap-style swaps, further aligning the project's functionality with that of the Uniswap app. Throughout this interaction, the AI aimed to gather more detailed requirements from the user to better understand the project's scope and specific needs.
